SELECT _user.empno, _user.empname, _spehist.monthperiod curmonth, _spehist.freetax, _spehist.freetaxs, _spehist.salarycompanyid, _spehist.realpretaxwages, _spehist.realpretaxwage, _spehist.sociinsurcharges, _spehist.sociinsurcharge, ( _spehist.totalspecialtaxs - _spehist.specialtax ) specialtaxs, _spehist.specialtax, _spehist.startpoints, _spehist.startpoint, _spehist.realpersonalincometaxs, _spehist.realpersonalincometax, _spehist.salarys, _spehist.salary FROM hr_salary_specialtaxempgrosspayhis _spehist INNER JOIN sys_user _user ON _spehist.empid = _user.empid INNER JOIN sys_duty _duty ON _duty.dutyid = _user.dutyid INNER JOIN sys_department _dept ON _dept.deptid = _duty.deptid WHERE ( _dept.treesign LIKE '1-3-%' ) AND _spehist.yearperiod = #{year} AND _spehist.monthperiod <= #{salaryMonth}
